Title: Data protection in the age of the adversary | ODSP1491
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
The nature, scale, and sophistication of cyber threats has evolved dramatically. When you sit on mountains of data the risk of weaponization and AI-powered attacks only grows. Quentin and Caleb share threat stories from the frontlines and a four-phase approach to accelerate the adoption of Microsoft Purview to ensure sensitive data is protected and you can stay one step ahead of attackers.
